Name: Sunny Side Up
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Highball (max 10oz/300ml) glass .
Prepare garnish of dehydrated grapefruit & rhubarb slice.
Review: Bittersweet zesty citrus and cognac with aromatic wine.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2015 by Christopher McQuillan at Am:pm, Belfast, Northern Ireland.
Nutrition: One serving of Sunny Side Up contains 200 calories
